mapper.insert: insert into w_admininfo (admin_id, admin_name, admin_password, admin_telphone, admin_email, admin_creat_time, admin_staus) values (#{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminTelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{adminCreatTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{adminStaus,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update w_admininfo set admin_name = #{adminName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_password = #{adminPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_telphone = #{adminTelphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_email = #{adminEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, admin_creat_time = #{adminCreatTime,jdbcType=DATE}, admin_staus = #{adminStaus,jdbcType=INTEGER} where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select admin_id, admin_name, admin_password, admin_telphone, admin_email, admin_creat_time, admin_staus from w_admininfo where admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select admin_id, admin_name, admin_password, admin_telphone, admin_email, admin_creat_time, admin_staus from w_admininfo
